WorkItem.Description: I need to show some reports with filter options using CrystalReports as marked in the attached file. Could you please provide a sample project in ASP.Net MVC2 with CrystalReports. I Need to render the reports on the view not only to exprot using "ExportToHttpResponse" from controller. I have done a test ( for export & with ASP.Net Web mixed) and it works but I could not render to the View, it shows some exceptions. So please provide a simple MVC Project using CrystalReport to Show Data in View. I tried & then google but find only the export options. I need it urgently...Please.
